name: Chilito Arcade
description:
Chilito is a procedurally generated plataformer, based on a dream I had of a chili plush my grandparents bought me on Mexican Independance Day, where he would fight carrots, and the mastermind, the broccoli.

It's a simple game, that serves as my introduction to game development, however, I would appreciate very much if you could contribute with $2 dollars, because I am only developing games to finance my open-source career. I am currently working on a free, decentrallized search engine at https://wearebuildingthefuture.com, but I need some money to pay for the server, the TLS and such and continue to improve the service and provide it for free.
